summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of 2026 fintech design theme implementation. Deep space dark backgrounds (#04060e), gradient typography with cyan-to-green animations, navigation glassmorphism, and text readability all working excellently. Minor enhancements needed for CTA button glow effects and additional glassmorphism in trading terminal and screener sections.

design_enhancements.issue: Shadow glow effects using CSS custom properties may not render visually
design_enhancements.details: Shadow classes are applied but glow effect may need fallback CSS for better visibility

design_enhancements.issue: Limited glassmorphism effects in terminal preview cards
design_enhancements.details: Only found backdrop-blur elements, could enhance with more glass card styling

design_enhancements.issue: Only 1 glass card found in scanner categories, could have more glassmorphism
design_enhancements.details: Scanner category cards could benefit from additional glass styling

passed_tests: Deep space dark background (#04060e) implemented perfectly with rgb(4, 6, 14)
Hero headline 'Market Intelligence' displays with cyan-to-green gradient (gradient-text-hero)
Navigation bar has glass effect with backdrop-blur-2xl (40px blur)
Gradient text animations working with 9 different gradient classes
Stock detail page maintains consistent dark background theme
Stock chart component renders correctly on dark background with proper contrast
Screener page maintains consistent dark background theme
Text readability excellent with light colors on dark background
Stats badges and indicators have proper contrast and visibility
Gradient text classes include: gradient-text-hero, gradient-text-professional, gradient-text-accent
Animation effects working: shimmer-professional, gradient-shift-professional, gradient-subtle
Live market ticker elements have glassmorphism with backdrop-blur-xl
Feature cards have proper glassmorphism with backdrop-blur, borders, and gradients
HTML dark mode class applied correctly
CSS custom properties for deep space theme working (--background-primary: 4 6 14)
Nebula gradient overlays visible in background images
Multiple gradient text variants working across different sections
